code: import React from"react";import datePeriodsIT from"../../JSON/booking-periods_it.json";import datePeriodsEN from"../../JSON/booking-periods_en.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const PricesAndConditions=_ref=>{let{language,isMenuOpened}=_ref;const renderBookingPeriods=()=>{const periods=language==='italian'?datePeriodsIT:datePeriodsEN;return periods.map((item,index)=>{const{name_it:nameIT='',name_en:nameEN='',date=[],prices={}}=item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"section-title",children:language==='italian'?nameIT:nameEN}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrap-dates",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"first-date",children:date[0]||""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"second-date",children:date[1]||""})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap-prices",children:Object.keys(prices).map((priceKey,priceIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"room-price",children:[" ",priceKey,": ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:prices[priceKey]})]},priceIndex))})]},index);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isMenuOpened?"hidden":"prices-and-conditions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"title",children:language==='italian'?'PREZZI E CONDIZIONI':'PRICES AND CONDITIONS'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"prices-table",children:renderBookingPeriods()})]});};
